name: Florence
subtitle: Nature's Control Master
statsDescription: Florence has the second-highest base LUCK (15, tied with Hootini) for excellent crit potential. High CON (12) provides decent base stamina. Very low SPECIAL (2, lowest among all companions) means root duration starts weak but the damage boost is still strong. Balanced STR and DEX provide consistent damage output.

content.name: Grasping Roots!
content.description: A powerful crowd control ability that completely immobilizes enemies while dealing massive damage. Florence channels nature's power to root enemies in place, neutralizing threats while dealing devastating attacks.

items: Damage Boost: +175-269%+ damage (scales with SPECIAL)
Root Duration: 1-5 seconds (scales with SPECIAL)
Stamina Cost: +2 stamina per attack while active, +3 stamina to apply root
Cooldown: 18 seconds (for root application)
Always Active: Damage boost applies continuously, root on cooldown

content.text: Grasping Roots is unique among companion abilities - the damage boost is always active when enabled, but rooting enemies has a cooldown. This creates a high-risk, high-reward playstyle:

Key Mechanic: When Grasping Roots is enabled, every attack costs +2 stamina (3 total). When you hit an enemy and the root cooldown is ready, an additional +3 stamina is consumed to apply the root (6 stamina total for that hit). This high stamina cost means you must manage resources carefully.

content.text: The damage boost starts at +175% (2.75√ó multiplier) and increases by 3% per SPECIAL point. Even with Florence's low base SPECIAL (2), the ability provides nearly 170% bonus damage continuously.
The root duration asymptotically approaches 5 seconds as SPECIAL increases. Even at base SPECIAL=2, you get ~1 second of immobilization, which is enough to prevent an enemy attack or reposition.

items: Manual Activation Required: Must press the Grasping Roots button
High Stamina Required: 3 stamina per normal attack, 6 stamina for root application
Companion Awake: Companion must not be sleeping
Root Cooldown: 18-second cooldown for root application (damage boost always active)

content.text: Critical Limitation: Grasping Roots has the highest stamina cost of any companion ability. Every attack costs 3 stamina (base 1 + ability 2), and rooting an enemy costs an additional 3 stamina for a total of 6 stamina. With Florence's base max stamina of 5, you cannot apply a root without first increasing your max stamina through SPECIAL or CON investment.

items: Normal attack without ability: 1 stamina
Attack with Grasping Roots active: 3 stamina (1 base + 2 ability)
Root application (when cooldown ready): 6 stamina total (3 for attack + 3 for root)
Base max stamina: 5 (3 + 0 SPECIAL/15 + 2 CON/5)

content.text: To use Grasping Roots effectively, you must invest in either:

items: CON to increase max stamina (every 5 CON = +1 stamina)
SPECIAL to increase max stamina (every 15 SPECIAL = +1 stamina)
Both for maximum stamina capacity

content.text: Each STR point increases damage by 1.0%. With base STR=9, Florence starts with a 0.74 damage multiplier. The low scaling is offset by the massive +175-269% damage boost from Grasping Roots, making total damage output very high.
